pages.text: Great, your villager knows what items you want! Now, they just need SOMEWHERE to work.$(br2)Most villagers will want to work in a specific type of room.$(br2)Gatherers are a bit special. They need a TOWN GATE so they can venture off into the world and find supplies.$(br2)Let's build one somewhere close!
Hint: To get a Welcome Mat, right-click on the base of the town flag with a Pressure Plate in hand.
